verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
For I know that nothing can keep me
From the love of my Lord
Neither death nor life,
The fears we have today,
Or our worries for tomorrow
For the angels speed it on its way,
And the powers of hell itself
Can not keep it away!

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
It makes no difference
If I'm on mountain top
Or at the ocean's end,
For the Lord has made it all,
And all is in his hands!
